CustomField.description: -Ability to interface with authorities, agents, forwarders, vendors, colleagues, etc. -Respond to enquires, clarifications, and changes in a timely manner (via phone, email, etc.) -Prepare shipping quotes -Manage colleague's and client's expectations -Actively seek feedback/updates from clients (agents, forwarders, etc.) - share the information in a timely and accurate manner. So that team members can review & track for improvements.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Ability to interface with authorities, agents, forwarders, vendors, colleagues, etc. -Respond to enquires, clarifications, and changes in a timely manner (via phone, email, etc.) -Prepare shipping quotes -Manage colleague's and client's expectations -Actively seek feedback/updates from clients (agents, forwarders, etc.) - share the information in a timely and accurate manner. So that team members can review & track for improvements.
CustomField.label: Client Servicing [Shipping]
